MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr, affecting properties in Newmarket Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1:49pm. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate the fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:19pm on the 17th of April 2021
